actor_awards.notes: Known as 'The Latin Lover' and became a global pop culture icon. Received a Star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame in 1960. His premature death at age 31 caused mass hysteria among his female fans.

filmography.title: The Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse
filmography.role_description: A wealthy Argentine playboy who becomes involved in World War I, a role that launched Valentino to superstardom.
filmography.plot: An extended family is split up in France and Germany by World War I, forcing them to fight on opposite sides.

filmography.title: The Sheik
filmography.role_description: An Arab Sheik who falls in love with an Englishwoman and abducts her, becoming his most iconic role.
filmography.plot: A charming Arabian sheik becomes infatuated with an adventurous modern-thinking Englishwoman and abducts her to his home in the desert.

filmography.title: Blood and Sand
filmography.role_description: A poor village boy who rises to fame as a matador but is torn between his virtuous wife and a seductive vamp.
filmography.plot: A peasant boy achieves fame and fortune as a bullfighter, only to be seduced by a wealthy widow and lose his way.

filmography.title: The Son of the Sheik
filmography.role_description: Valentino plays a dual role as both the original Sheik and his son in his final film released posthumously.
filmography.plot: The son of the Sheik is lured into a trap by a gang of thieves, believing the woman he loves is bait.

filmography.title: The Eagle
filmography.role_description: A Russian lieutenant who rejects the advances of Czarina Catherine II and becomes a masked outlaw.
filmography.plot: A Russian soldier catches the eye of the Czarina but rejects her, fleeing to become a masked vigilante seeking justice for his father.

filmography.title: Monsieur Beaucaire
filmography.role_description: A French duke who flees to England and poses as a barber to avoid a royal marriage.
filmography.plot: A French nobleman disguises himself as a barber in England and falls in love with a princess.

filmography.title: Beyond the Rocks
filmography.role_description: A dashing nobleman who falls in love with a woman trapped in a loveless marriage to an older man.
filmography.plot: A young woman marries an older millionaire to save her father's finances, but falls in love with a handsome nobleman on her honeymoon.

filmography.title: Camille
filmography.role_description: A young law student who falls deeply in love with a famous Parisian courtesan.
filmography.plot: A courtesan in Paris falls in love with a young man, but his father convinces her that their relationship will ruin his future.

filmography.title: The Conquering Power
filmography.role_description: A young dandy whose father sends him to the country, where he falls for his miserly uncle's daughter.
filmography.plot: A young man is sent to stay with his miserly uncle and falls in love with his cousin, sparking a family conflict.

filmography.title: Moran of the Lady Letty
filmography.role_description: A wealthy San Francisco socialite who is shanghaied and must prove his manhood at sea.
filmography.plot: A socialite is shanghaied onto a ship where he falls in love with the captain's daughter and fights a band of pirates.

filmography.title: The Young Rajah
filmography.role_description: An Indian prince raised in America who must come to terms with his mystic heritage and destiny.
filmography.plot: An Indian prince, hidden in America for his safety, discovers his true identity and his ability to see the future.

filmography.title: Cobra
filmography.role_description: An Italian nobleman and antiques expert who struggles with his reputation as a libertine.
filmography.plot: An Italian count travels to New York to escape his past but finds himself entangled in a romance with his friend's wife.

filmography.title: All Night
filmography.role_description: A rare comedic role for Valentino as a young man trying to impress a girl at a dinner party.
filmography.plot: To inherit a fortune, a man must prove he is married, leading to a night of mistaken identities and comedic situations.

filmography.title: The Delicious Little Devil
filmography.role_description: The son of a wealthy businessman who falls for a dancer forced to take a job as a hostess.
filmography.plot: A poor hat-check girl poses as a famous dancer to support her family and falls in love with a wealthy young man.

filmography.title: Stolen Moments
filmography.role_description: A villainous Brazilian novelist who blackmails a woman with whom he had a past indiscretion.
filmography.plot: A woman's past indiscretion with a Brazilian adventurer comes back to haunt her when he returns to threaten her happiness.

filmography.title: A Sainted Devil
filmography.role_description: A South American nobleman whose bride is kidnapped on their wedding night. (Lost Film)
filmography.plot: A wealthy rancher seeks revenge after his wife is abducted by a bandit on their wedding night.

filmography.title: The Wonderful Chance
filmography.role_description: A supporting villain role where Valentino plays a man held hostage by an impersonator.
filmography.plot: An ex-convict impersonates a wealthy man to steal jewels but ends up falling in love and reforming.

filmography.title: Eyes of Youth
filmography.role_description: A con man who attempts to compromise the protagonist in one of her possible futures.
filmography.plot: A young woman consults a yogi who shows her the different paths her life could take depending on her choices.

filmography.title: A Society Sensation
filmography.role_description: A young society man who falls for a duchess's daughter in this comedy-drama.
filmography.plot: A fisherman's daughter inherits a fortune and enters high society, where she meets a wealthy young man.

filmography.title: The Married Virgin
filmography.role_description: A scoundrel count who marries an heiress for her money while having an affair with her stepmother.
filmography.plot: A young woman marries a count to save her father from prison, unaware of the count's sinister motives.

filmography.title: Once to Every Woman
filmography.role_description: An Italian admirer of a young woman who becomes a famous opera singer.
filmography.plot: A village girl rises to become a famous prima donna but loses her voice after a personal tragedy.

filmography.title: Uncharted Seas
filmography.role_description: A heroic role where Valentino rescues a woman from the Arctic.
filmography.plot: A man rescues the wife of a drunkard during an expedition to the Arctic.

filmography.title: Passion's Playground
filmography.role_description: A prince who is the brother of a man who seduces a convent girl.
filmography.plot: A young woman leaves a convent and enters high society, seeking revenge on the family that wronged her.

filmography.title: Virtuous Sinners
filmography.role_description: An early minor role in Valentino's career before his rise to stardom.
filmography.plot: A story of redemption and social struggles in the slums.

filmography.title: The Big Little Person
filmography.role_description: A suitor to the protagonist in this romance drama.
filmography.plot: A young woman loses her hearing after an illness and breaks off her engagement, believing her fianc√© loves someone else.
